name: Cube Ball Fall
description:
This is my Entry for the 4th Alakajam Game Jam, the Theme was Falling.
This is also my First participation in a Game Jam ;)

This is a Gravity Maze puzzle game. Turn flip and rotate the maze to make the ball fall through the maze to the end.

Controls are a combo of mouse and WASD.

There is currently 1 level. minimal UI. Music. 

Apparently if you are not on using Chrome on Linux you will get no sound. 
So, Play this YouTube vid along side. ;) https://youtu.be/PtdeCBjf6lY

Enjoy!

EDIT: I have changed the colour of base cube of the maze as the web version struggles to show the shadows.
